system.description:
At 6th level, you have the ability to turn a defeated foe into a temporarily loyal ally. When you kill a creature targeted by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.oxd2xyqifqzt7wbr], or under the effects of one of your warlock spells, you can have your patron bind the dead creature to you, summoning a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.3elv0z3gn27mznir]{Shadow} or a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.t1zk7brhlnharh5x]{Specter} (your choice) from the corpse. The undead rolls its own initiative, has its own turns, and obeys your verbal commands. The undead disappears after 1 minute, when you are knocked unconscious, or when it is reduced to 0 hit points.

At 15th level, you can instead choose to have your patron reanimate the corpse as a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.td9fnxdbtx7shcaf]{Skeletal Champion}, or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.uvkun2eiejd0y8ts]{Zombie Knight} instead.

Once you have used this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
